alert.note: Alert for Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 18 at 11:38PM EST until December 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...River and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast New Jersey, including the following county, Union. * WHEN...Until 330 AM EST. * IMPACTS...River or stream flows remain elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1133 PM EST, Gauge reports from the Rahway River at Rahway indicated minor flooding. Flood waters should recede during the overnight. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Robinsons Branch. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
